data.taskDescription:
Descripción de tareas para completar el frontend en Flutter

Completar los 9 epics del frontend de la aplicación "Pasos" (contador de pasos social) usando Flutter.

================================================================================

CONTEXTO

================================================================================

El backend ya está completo en: project-app-pasos-backend

El frontend debe ir en: project-app-pasos-frontend-flutter (crear nueva estructura)

Usar Flutter para aplicación móvil nativa multiplataforma (iOS/Android)

================================================================================

EPICS A IMPLEMENTAR

================================================================================

FLUTTER FOUNDATION

Setup de Flutter + estructura del proyecto

Configuración de dependencias base (provider/bloc, dio, etc.)

PLATFORM CONFIG

Configuración para iOS/Android

Permisos para Health APIs (HealthKit/Google Fit)

Configuración de AndroidManifest.xml y Info.plist

UI FOUNDATION

Sistema de diseño con Material Design 3

Routing y navegación (go_router)

Tema oscuro/claro (ThemeData)

Widgets reutilizables

AUTH UI

Pantallas de login, registro y recuperación de contraseña

Gestión de estado de autenticación

Almacenamiento seguro de tokens (flutter_secure_storage)

DASHBOARD

Vista principal con contador de pasos

Historial de actividad

Gráficos (fl_chart o charts_flutter)

Pull-to-refresh

SHARING UI

Lista de amigos

Gestión de compartir datos con amigos

Solicitudes de amistad

Vista de actividad de amigos

GOALS UI

Grupos y metas compartidas

Creación y edición de metas

Progreso de grupos

Rankings

NATIVE INTEGRATION

Integración con podómetro nativo usando health package

Lectura de pasos desde HealthKit (iOS)

Lectura de pasos desde Google Fit/Health Connect (Android)

Background sync de datos

REAL-TIME CLIENT

Integración WebSocket con web_socket_channel

Actualizaciones en tiempo real

Notificaciones push (firebase_messaging)

Manejo de reconexión

epics.title: Flutter Foundation - Project Setup and Core Infrastructure
epics.description: Initialize Flutter project with Clean Architecture structure, configure dependencies (provider/riverpod, dio, go_router), set up dependency injection, create base classes for error handling, and establish networking infrastructure

stories.title: Initialize Flutter project with pubspec.yaml
stories.description: Create new Flutter project, configure pubspec.yaml with all required dependencies: dio, riverpod, go_router, flutter_secure_storage, health, web_socket_channel, fl_chart, etc.

stories.title: Create core folder structure
stories.description: Set up lib/core/ with di/, network/, errors/, utils/, config/ directories and base files

stories.title: Configure Dio HTTP client with interceptors
stories.description: Create DioClient singleton with auth, error, and logging interceptors. Define API endpoints constants matching backend routes.

stories.title: Create main.dart with app initialization
stories.description: Configure main.dart with ProviderScope, dependency injection initialization, and app bootstrap

epics.title: Platform Configuration - iOS/Android Health API Setup
epics.description: Configure iOS (HealthKit) and Android (Google Fit/Health Connect) platform-specific permissions and entitlements for accessing step data from native health APIs
followsPatterns: Platform-specific configuration in ios/ and android/ directories
Health API permissions follow Apple and Google guidelines

stories.title: Configure iOS HealthKit permissions
stories.description: Update Info.plist with NSHealthShareUsageDescription, NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription. Create Runner.entitlements with HealthKit capability. Configure Podfile for health package.

stories.title: Configure Android Health Connect permissions
stories.description: Update AndroidManifest.xml with health permissions (ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION, BODY_SENSORS). Configure build.gradle with compileSdk 34+ for Health Connect.

stories.title: Create platform-specific utilities
stories.description: Create health_permissions.dart for requesting and checking permissions, platform_info.dart for detecting platform capabilities

epics.title: UI Foundation - Design System and Navigation
epics.description: Implement Material Design 3 theming with dark/light modes, create go_router navigation configuration, build reusable widget library including buttons, inputs, cards, and loading states

stories.title: Create Material Design 3 theme system
stories.description: Implement AppTheme with light/dark ThemeData, AppColors with semantic color tokens, AppTextStyles with typography scale, AppSpacing with consistent spacing values

stories.title: Configure go_router navigation
stories.description: Create AppRouter with GoRouter configuration, route_names.dart constants, route_guards.dart for auth protection. Define all app routes.

stories.title: Build reusable widget library
stories.description: Create base widgets: AppButton (primary/secondary/outline variants), AppTextField (with validation), AppCard, LoadingIndicator, ErrorWidget, EmptyState, AvatarWidget

stories.title: Create step counter display widget
stories.description: Build StepCounterDisplay widget showing animated step count with circular progress indicator

stories.title: Create root App widget
stories.description: Create app.dart with MaterialApp.router, theme provider, and global configurations

epics.title: Auth UI - Authentication Screens and Flow
epics.description: Implement login, registration, and password recovery screens. Create auth state management with Riverpod, secure token storage with flutter_secure_storage, and automatic token refresh flow

stories.title: Create auth domain layer
stories.description: Define User and AuthTokens entities, AuthRepository interface, and use cases (LoginUseCase, RegisterUseCase, LogoutUseCase, GetCurrentUserUseCase)

stories.title: Implement auth data layer
stories.description: Create UserModel and AuthTokensModel with fromJson/toJson. Implement AuthRemoteDataSource for API calls, AuthLocalDataSource for secure storage, AuthRepositoryImpl

stories.title: Create auth state management
stories.description: Implement AuthState sealed class with states (initial, loading, authenticated, unauthenticated, error). Create AuthNotifier extending StateNotifier.

stories.title: Build login screen
stories.description: Create LoginScreen with email/password fields, validation, remember me checkbox, forgot password link, and register navigation

stories.title: Build registration screen
stories.description: Create RegisterScreen with username, email, password, confirm password fields. Include real-time username/email availability checks.

stories.title: Build splash and auth flow screens
stories.description: Create SplashScreen for initial auth check, ForgotPasswordScreen for password recovery flow

epics.title: Dashboard - Step Counter and Activity History
epics.description: Build main dashboard showing current step count with animated counter, daily/weekly step history with charts using fl_chart, pull-to-refresh functionality, and step statistics display

stories.title: Create steps domain layer
stories.description: Define StepRecord, StepStats, WeeklyTrend entities. Create StepsRepository interface and use cases for all step operations.

stories.title: Implement steps data layer
stories.description: Create models (StepRecordModel, StepStatsModel, WeeklyTrendModel) with JSON serialization. Implement StepsRemoteDataSource and StepsRepositoryImpl.

stories.title: Create dashboard state management
stories.description: Implement DashboardState with todaySteps, weeklyTrend, stats. Create DashboardNotifier for managing dashboard data.

stories.title: Build main dashboard screen
stories.description: Create DashboardScreen with animated step counter, daily goal progress, quick stats summary, and navigation to detailed views

stories.title: Build chart widgets
stories.description: Create WeeklyChart showing 7-day bar chart, HourlyChart showing 24-hour activity distribution using fl_chart

stories.title: Build history and stats screens
stories.description: Create HistoryScreen with scrollable activity list, StatsScreen with detailed statistics and achievements

epics.title: Sharing UI - Friends and Social Features
epics.description: Implement friends list, friend request management, user search for adding friends, shared activity view showing friends' step counts, and friend profile screens
followsPatterns: Search with debounce using Debouncer utility

stories.title: Create sharing domain layer
stories.description: Define SharingRelationship and SharedUserStats entities. Create SharingRepository interface and all sharing use cases.

stories.title: Implement sharing data layer
stories.description: Create SharingRelationshipModel and SharedUserStatsModel. Implement SharingRemoteDataSource and SharingRepositoryImpl.

stories.title: Create sharing state management
stories.description: Implement SharingState with friends list, pending requests, search results. Create SharingNotifier for all sharing operations.

stories.title: Build friends list screen
stories.description: Create FriendsScreen with list of accepted friends, their current step counts, and navigation to profiles. Include empty state.

stories.title: Build friend requests screen
stories.description: Create FriendRequestsScreen showing incoming/outgoing requests with accept/reject/cancel actions

stories.title: Build user search screen
stories.description: Create SearchUsersScreen with debounced search input, results list, and send request action

stories.title: Build friend profile screen
stories.description: Create FriendProfileScreen showing friend's stats, activity history, and sharing management options

epics.title: Goals UI - Group Goals and Challenges
epics.description: Build group goals feature with goal creation, member management, progress tracking, leaderboards showing member rankings, and goal invitation handling
followsPatterns: Date range picker for goal dates

stories.title: Create goals domain layer
stories.description: Define GroupGoal, GoalMember, GoalProgress entities. Create GoalsRepository interface and all goal-related use cases.

stories.title: Implement goals data layer
stories.description: Create GroupGoalModel, GoalMemberModel, GoalProgressModel with JSON serialization. Implement GoalsRemoteDataSource and GoalsRepositoryImpl.

stories.title: Create goals state management
stories.description: Implement GoalsState with userGoals, selectedGoal, invitations. Create GoalsNotifier for all goal operations.

stories.title: Build goals list screen
stories.description: Create GoalsListScreen showing active/completed goals with progress indicators, pending invitations section

stories.title: Build goal detail screen
stories.description: Create GoalDetailScreen with goal info, progress ring, member leaderboard, and management actions

stories.title: Build create goal screen
stories.description: Create CreateGoalScreen with form for title, description, target steps, date range picker for start/end dates

stories.title: Build invite members screen
stories.description: Create InviteMembersScreen showing friends list with invite/uninvite actions

epics.title: Native Integration - Health API Step Tracking
epics.description: Implement native step data integration using health package for HealthKit (iOS) and Google Fit/Health Connect (Android). Handle permission requests, step reading, background sync, and data reconciliation
followsPatterns: health package for cross-platform health data
Background fetch for iOS using workmanager
Foreground service for Android background sync

stories.title: Create health domain layer
stories.description: Define HealthStepData entity. Create HealthRepository interface with methods for permissions, step reading, and syncing.

stories.title: Implement health data layer
stories.description: Create HealthDataSource using health package. Implement platform-specific step reading for HealthKit and Google Fit. Create HealthRepositoryImpl.

stories.title: Create health state management
stories.description: Implement HealthState with permission status, sync status, last sync time. Create HealthNotifier for health operations.

stories.title: Build health setup screen
stories.description: Create HealthSetupScreen for onboarding users through permission requests with platform-specific instructions

stories.title: Implement background sync service
stories.description: Create BackgroundSyncService using workmanager for periodic sync. Implement StepSyncManager for reconciling native and server data.

epics.title: Real-Time Client - WebSocket Integration
epics.description: Implement WebSocket client using web_socket_channel for real-time step updates and goal progress. Handle connection management, authentication, reconnection with exponential backoff, and event dispatching to relevant providers
followsPatterns: Singleton socket manager with auth token injection

stories.title: Create WebSocket client infrastructure
stories.description: Implement SocketClient using web_socket_channel with authentication. Define SocketEvents constants matching backend events.

stories.title: Implement socket manager and reconnection
stories.description: Create SocketManager singleton for connection lifecycle. Implement ReconnectionStrategy with exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, max 30s).

stories.title: Create event handlers
stories.description: Implement StepsEventHandler for steps-updated events, GoalsEventHandler for goal-progress and goal:member-joined, SharingEventHandler for sharing:joined

stories.title: Integrate socket events with providers
stories.description: Update DashboardProvider, GoalsProvider, SharingProvider to listen for and react to real-time events

stories.title: Build notification system
stories.description: Create AppNotification entity, NotificationProvider for managing in-app notifications, NotificationBadge and NotificationListItem widgets
